column4: Hi, i have downloaded Ubuntu 11.10 and want to install it from USB-Stick, but PC says: BOOTMGR not found. Where can I get the BOOTMGR?
Hi, i have downloaded Ubuntu 11.10 and want to install it from USB-Stick, but PC says: BOOTMGR not found. Where can I get the BOOTMGR?
did you MD5 test the ISO you downloaded?
Actually I copied from a CD, which worked on another PC.
